header.class: flex flex-wrap p-4 w-full mx-width mx-auto items-center

div.class: hidden absolute bg-white shadow border-b-2 border-blue-400 w-64 right-0 top-0 pt-20 -mt-4 text-lg flex-col leading-none z-10

a.class: flex items-center no-underline px-4 py-3 hover:bg-gray-300

span.class: flex items-center no-underline px-4 py-3 bg-blue-200

a.class: flex items-center no-underline px-4 py-3 hover:bg-gray-300
flex items-center no-underline px-4 py-3 hover:bg-gray-300
flex items-center no-underline px-4 py-3 hover:bg-gray-300
flex items-center no-underline px-4 py-3 hover:bg-gray-300

label.class: top-menu__icon px-4 py-8 mr-1 -ml-4 -mb-4 hidden -mt-4 md:block cursor-pointer md:order-first

nav.class: top-menu__content w-full flex md:hidden pt-2 md_min:font-semibold text-lg md:border-t md:border-gray-200 mt-4

form.class: flex ml-8 md:ml-0 md:mb-4 md:mt-4 md:w-full

input.class: appearance-none flex-grow bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 border border-gray-200 rounded-l h-10 py-2 px-4 leading-tight focus:outline-hidden focus:bg-white focus:border-gray-500
input.name: text

button.class: h-10 w-10 bg-blue-700 bg-gray-200 text-white rounded-r p-2

ol.class: flex items-center list-reset whitespace-no-wrap m-0 breadcrumb

div.div: The page you're looking for has either been moved or removed from the site.

section.class: modal inset-0 fixed z-10 items-center justify-center

div.class: bg-white z-30 w-1/4 p-8 md:w-1/2 xs:w-full xs:h-full
flex justify-between items-center text-3xl border-b-2 pb-2 border-gray-400 mb-8
